title: Modern War Vol 2 Underscore
description: Short Description: Seven tracks (+3 edits derived from them) that'll work as great underscore for action and modern themes.
longDescription:
Preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KAefo5W-2Dc

Twelve tracks (7 tracks + 3 edits derived from them), that range from epic, percussion driven beats to calmer, noble generic tracks. Suits any modern setting.

Tracks:
1. Percussive 01 - Lock n’ load, go!
- Percussive 01 Main
- Percussive 01 Part B
- Percussive 01 Loop
- Bonus Braam
2. Fields of Fire - Calm, noble underscore with a basic, generic theme accompanied with percussion.
3. Percussive 02 - Lock n’ load again!
4. Night - Calm, soft tension driven track.
5. Generic Theme - a generic, “epic” theme for menu or cinematic moments, works also as underscore for scene entries or non-action sections of a game.
6. Generic Theme (Guitar Version) - A softer, more ambient version of the Generic Theme. Good for menu or non-action sections.
7. Generic Theme (Piano) - a piano version of the Generic Theme. Good for menu or non-action sections.
technicalDetails:
